comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/batman60] Elmendorf AFB...no exact date but early WWII
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 15491569@N00
comment._content:
Based on the national insignia, this would have been mid-late war... also note the B-25s, C-47s, and P-39s in the background which appear to be bound for the USSR. (the red star on white disc is visible on a few ships) There's at least one A-20 in there, as well.

Groovy photo!
 
 
Fade to Black...
